abstract: Pakistan announces first drone strike by domestically produced drone has killed three high-profile militants in Shawal Valley.
lead_paragraph: The drone was aimed at a hide-out in the Shawal Valley, a military spokesman said, but no details were provided about the identities of the dead.

headline.main: Pakistan Says Its Drone Killed 3 Militants
headline.print_headline: Pakistan Says Its Drone Killed Three Militants

snippet: The drone was aimed at a hide-out in the Shawal Valley, a military spokesman said, but no details were provided about the identities of the dead.
